ideas.title: Smart Bookmark Manager with Tags & Search
ideas.description: Build a Chrome/Firefox extension that saves bookmarks with automatic tag suggestions based on page content. Include full-text search and organize by categories.

ideas.title: Personal Finance Tracker with Budget Alerts
ideas.description: Track expenses, set monthly budgets per category, and get alerts when approaching limits. Visualize spending patterns with charts.

ideas.title: Pomodoro Timer with Task Integration
ideas.description: A productivity timer that integrates with your task list. Track how much time you spend on each task and generate productivity reports.

ideas.title: GitHub Issue Template Generator
ideas.description: Create custom issue templates for GitHub repos with a visual editor. Export as markdown files ready to use in .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/

ideas.title: Automated Screenshot Organizer
ideas.description: Monitors your screenshots folder, uses OCR to extract text, and auto-organizes them into folders based on content (receipts, code snippets, memes, etc.)

ideas.title: Multi-Language Code Snippet Manager
ideas.description: Save and search code snippets with syntax highlighting, tags, and categories. Export snippets as gists or markdown files.

ideas.title: Local Password Strength Analyzer
ideas.description: Offline tool that checks password strength, suggests improvements, and generates secure passwords. Includes breach database check without sending data online.
ideas.techStack: JavaScript/Python, zxcvbn library, Have I Been Pwned API (k-anonymity)

ideas.title: Meeting Notes Extractor from Video
ideas.description: Upload recorded meeting videos, extract audio, transcribe using speech-to-text, and summarize key points and action items.
ideas.techStack: Python, FFmpeg, Whisper AI, OpenAI API (or local models)

ideas.title: Habit Tracker with Streak Visualization
ideas.description: Track daily habits with calendar heatmap (GitHub-style), send reminders, and show longest streaks. Export data as CSV.

ideas.title: Smart Shopping List with Price History
ideas.description: Add items to shopping list, track where you bought them and at what price. Get alerts when prices drop or items go on sale.

ideas.title: Clipboard History Manager
ideas.description: Keep history of everything you copy (text, images, files). Search through history, pin favorites, and sync across devices.
ideas.techStack: Electron, Node.js, SQLite, System clipboard API

ideas.title: Local Markdown Wiki with Backlinks
ideas.description: Personal wiki using markdown files with automatic backlink detection (like Obsidian). Graph view of note connections.
ideas.techStack: Node.js/Python, Markdown parser, D3.js for graph

ideas.title: Custom URL Shortener with Analytics
ideas.description: Self-hosted URL shortener with click tracking, geographic data, referrer info, and QR code generation.

ideas.title: Code Review Checklist Generator
ideas.description: Based on programming language and project type, generate customized code review checklists. Track review progress.

ideas.title: File Deduplicator with Hash Comparison
ideas.description: Scan directories for duplicate files using hash comparison. Preview duplicates and safely delete or move them.
ideas.techStack: Python/Node.js, Crypto libraries, File system API

ideas.title: Reading List Manager with Progress Tracking
ideas.description: Track books/articles you want to read, current page/chapter, reading speed, and estimated completion time.

ideas.title: System Resource Monitor Dashboard
ideas.description: Real-time dashboard showing CPU, RAM, disk usage, network activity, and running processes. Set alerts for high usage.

ideas.title: Git Commit Message Template Tool
ideas.description: Interactive CLI tool that helps write better commit messages following conventional commits. Integrates with git hooks.

ideas.title: Recipe Scaling Calculator
ideas.description: Input a recipe, specify serving size change, and automatically scale all ingredient quantities. Save modified recipes.

ideas.title: DNS Cache Monitor & Flusher
ideas.description: View current DNS cache, flush specific entries or all, and monitor DNS resolution times for debugging.
ideas.techStack: Python/Node.js, System DNS commands, GUI framework

ideas.title: Browser Tab Session Manager
ideas.description: Save current browser tab sessions with names, restore them later. Useful for different work contexts.
ideas.techStack: Browser Extension, JavaScript, Browser Storage API

ideas.title: Regex Tester with Common Patterns Library
ideas.description: Test regex patterns with real-time matching, save frequently used patterns, and browse library of common regex (email, phone, etc.)

ideas.title: Local Image Compressor Batch Tool
ideas.description: Drag and drop images for batch compression. Choose quality level, format conversion, and see file size savings.
ideas.techStack: Electron, Sharp/Jimp library, File system API

ideas.title: Terminal Command Cheatsheet Manager
ideas.description: Save commonly used terminal commands with descriptions and tags. Quick search and copy to clipboard.
ideas.techStack: CLI tool (Node.js/Python), JSON storage, Clipboard API

ideas.title: Focus Mode Website Blocker
ideas.description: Block distracting websites during focus sessions. Schedule blocked periods and track productivity time.
ideas.techStack: Browser Extension, JavaScript, Chrome Storage API
